content: not an exact pattern as these hats are freeform so this is a pattern guide come tutorial outlining a way of working relevant techniques joining and generally how i go about making my spiral hats the techniques can be adapted for just about anything yet lend themselves wonderfully to headwear - i have seen some wonderful hats made from this tutorial **i m unable to offer pattern support for my free patterns via ravelry pm or email - please visit the wormhead s hats group 1 if you have a question about this pattern thanks for your understanding ** 1 https //www ravelry com/discuss/woolly-wormheads-hats/topics/3891700
